name: Xpadder Controller Profile
summary: Learn about .XPADDERCONTROLLER files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Xpadder allows players to use a gamepad or joystick to play games that do not offer controller support.

description: Profile of a controller or joystick used by Xpadder, a keyboard and mouse emulation program; contains layout information for a controller and defines how the buttons and movements are mapped to a keyboard and mouse.
